alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 27 at 2:09PM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM SATURDAY TO 10 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph in the hills. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Ventura County Valleys, Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Calabasas and Agoura Hills, Western San Fernando Valley, and Southern Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM Saturday to 10 PM PDT Monday. Strongest on Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western San Fernando Valley
